Definition.WordDefinition: Marks, MS (city, FIPS 45240) Location: 34.25383 N, 90.27287 W Population (1990): 1758 (691 housing units) Area: 2.7 sq km (land), 0.0 sq km (water) Zip code(s): 38646
Marks n : English businessman who created a retail chain (1888-1964) [syn: {Simon Marks}, {First Baron Marks of Broughton}]
